short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add 'Automation' button to IronLikes.com and WordsOfIron.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds 'Automation' button to IronLikes.com and WordsOfIron.com websites.
After installing the extension, when going to IronLikes.com or WordsOfIron.com websites, a 'Start Automation' button appears. Clicking it allows the browser to start liking the "Iron Likes" and "Words of Iron" posts automatically, without having to click on each post manually. Using this button can save time and automate the process of liking "Iron Likes" and "Words of Iron" posts.
When user wants to stop the automation, he can click the 'Stop Automation' button.
